summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackDermalogica's Phyto Nature Oxygen Cream breathes new vitality into skin. With natural actives derived from plants that thrive in low-oxygen environments, this moisturizer helps skin absorb and utilize oxygen - firming, revitalizing, and plumping as it oxygenates to leave skin smooth and strong.
details: DetailsBenefitsFirms and lifts to reduce the appearance of skin agingRevitalizes with oxygen-optimizing phytoactives for brighter, more radiant skinPlumps and hydrates for ultra-smooth skinKey IngredientsLigustrum Lucidum Seed, Glycogen, and Nasturtium Flower: help oxygenate skin's surface by hydrating its upper layers for a smooth, energized appearanceAdaptogenic Astragalus: smooths and tightens for a lifted lookLuffa Root + Squalene: visibly firm, minimizing the appearance of fine lines and wrinklesRose of Winter: soothes and boosts skin's resilienceResearch ResultsClinically proven to give 4 years back - firmer and more lifted skin after 1 weekItem 2606355How To UseAfter cleansing and toning, apply over face and neck in light, upward strokes. Use twice daily, morning and night.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Panthenol, Squalane, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Hydrogenated Ethylhexyl Olivate, Propanediol, Triethylhexanoin, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Cetearyl Alcohol, Bis-Ethoxydiglycol Cyclohexane 1,4-Dicarboxylate, PEG-100 Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Hydroxyacetophenone, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ubiquinone, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Salvia Sclarea (Clary) Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Viola Odorata Leaf Extract, Camellia Sinensis Seed Oil, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Tapioca Starch, Chenopodium Quinoa Seed Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Powder, Sphingomonas Ferment Extract, Spilanthes Acmella Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Astragalus Membranaceus Root Extract, Hordeum Vulgare Seed Extract, Candida Bombicola/Glucose/Methyl Rapeseedate Ferment, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Lavandula Spica (Lavender) Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Litsea Cubeba Fruit Oil, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Extract, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Unsaponifiables, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Tocopherol, Carnosine, Allantoin, Caprylyl Glycol, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-9, Beta-Glucan, Caffeine, Mannitol, Bisabolol, Trehalose, Lactobacillus Ferment, 1,2-Hexanediol, Steareth-21, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Sodium Hydroxide, Aminomethyl Propanol, Carbomer, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Cellulose Gum, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Limonene, Linalool, Citral.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: After cleansing and toning, apply over face and neck in light, upward strokes. Use twice daily, morning and night.

reviews.headline: i don't understand the good reviews
reviews.comments: i love dermalogica but this is my least favorite of their products by far. the cream takes forever to absorb into your skin and leaves you looking and feeling like you rubbed baby oil all over your face. as a result, it made me break out. maybe it's just my skin since others seem to love this product, but i was very disappointed with it

reviews.headline: The bomb!!
reviews.comments: When i tell you after ONE use that this item had my skin feeling extra clean clear smooth and soft. Very good product!

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: So far this product has helped me a lot

reviews.headline: Provides refief
reviews.comments: Very dry skin.  This product offers hydration relief effectively 90% of the time.  When the Santa Ana winds blow, nothing will help.  I'm on my 4th bottle I like it that much!!

reviews.headline: Impressive
reviews.comments: Recieved a sample and used on my seriously purging skin. It never irritating my sensitive skin and actually felt soothing. It took hours to ansorb into my skin and left a slightly greasy feel. I awoke this morning to very happy skin - hydrated, smooth, plump and slightly firmer. Once my current moisturizer is empty, I'll be purchasing.

reviews.headline: Changed my skin
reviews.comments: This is my second time repurchasing. I hate the price but this has made a significant difference in my skin. I have sensitive dry skin and this has given my skin the moisture it needs and an amazing glow. I see others are complaining about it being "greasy" i havent had that issue. I apply two pumps to my skin and it gives me the most beautiful glow. I use everything Dermalogica and constantly get compliments on my skin.

reviews.headline: Best under eye cream
reviews.comments: This is one of those products that's been life changing in my routine. The way my under eyes look & feels from this product is phenomenal. This has helped with my fine lines and wrinkles. Helped firm my under eyes. Super rich lux formula. A little goes a long way. It awakens my under eyes.

reviews.headline: You could fry chicken with this stuff!
reviews.comments: I need moisture, not grease.  So sad. I will be going back to my Drunk Elephant.

reviews.headline: Oily Film
reviews.comments: Oooof..big fan of Dermalogica but not of this. Leaves an awful oily residue and film on skin; running, not walking to return.

reviews.headline: Greasy
reviews.comments: Does not absorb well. Face remains shiny and the product just sits on your skin. I did not see a reduction in wrinkles and I used it for almost 3 months 2x/day.

reviews.headline: Loving My Refined Complexion!
reviews.comments:
I received this product complimentary from Dermalogica in exchange for my honest review~

Absolutely fantastic! I've been using this dual-phase anti-aging firming serum for a few weeks now and I'm truly impressed. The combination of CAMU CAMU, hyaluronic acid, and green coffee bean extract has worked wonders on my skin. Not only does it feel firmer, but the fine lines and wrinkles are noticeably reduced. The texture is light and non-greasy, making it a pleasure to use. I highly recommend this serum to anyone looking for an effective anti-aging solution.

reviews.headline: great
reviews.comments: Dermalogica phyto nature firming serum has a lot of powerful ingredients to make this serum amazing for fine lines and wrinkles. This firms up my skin and gives it an overall better texture. It gives my skin a more healthy appearance and I look forward to applying this in the morning and at night. gifted by dermalogica

reviews.headline: In love
reviews.comments: This is the best stuff ever! So many compliments on my 46 yo skin within the fitst few weeks. It's pricey but worth every cent.

reviews.headline: Good investment for yourself
reviews.comments: My skin was getting texture/big pores. Also dryness. A ulta representative suggested this cream. He is also using this cream and his face is is flawless so I decided to give it a try. Within 2 weeks I started  noticing glowing skin. Within a month my friends started noticing my skin and I'm receiving alot of complements and friend wanting to know what I'm using.

reviews.headline: Dried out my sensitive skin
reviews.comments:
I really wanted to love this moisturizer but it didn't work for me. It dried out my face, I started getting dry patches around my mouth and chin.
It smelled great but not for me.

reviews.headline: Defect
reviews.comments: 3rd bottle and it got weird after 2 weeks, became serum like.

reviews.headline: Hydrating but greasy
reviews.comments:
I received the Phyto-Nature Oxygen Cream complimentary from Dermalogica in exchange for my honest feedback. 

This cream is extremely hydrating and gives my skin a fresh, bright, and youthful glow. It does feel a bit greasy on the skin which I don't love, and I struggle to justify the price.

reviews.headline: Love this moisturizer!
reviews.comments: I mix a splash with my foundation and i get so many compliments on my skin!

reviews.headline: Love it will keep using
reviews.comments: Name my face feel so nice and soft

reviews.headline: Made me break out
reviews.comments: This product made me break out with these little clustered pimples around my mouth and nose area after using this product for a week. Do not recommend this product for people with sensitive skin or acne prone skin.

media.headline: Good investment for yourself
media.caption: 36 yrs young. With less makeup now.

media.headline: My second bottle and I'm still obsessed!
One of a kind
media.caption: Skin feels so radiant and plump

faceoff_positive.comments: I rrcently received some Phyto Nature Oxygen Cream complimentary from Dermalogica in exchange for my honesr review, and I love it!  Oxygen Cream is a high-performance moisturizer that delivers powerful anti-aging benefits while hydrating and revitalizing the skin. This cream is formulated with a unique blend of plant-based ingredients and advanced biotechnology to help protect and repair the skin's natural barrier.  One of the standout features of this cream is its innovative packaging, which combines two formulas into one jar. The cream is separated into two chambers - one containing a rich, nourishing cream, and the other a lightweight gel. When dispensed, the two formulas are blended together to create a luxurious, whipped texture that feels incredibly indulgent on the skin.  The rich cream contains a blend of peptides, antioxidants, and botanical extracts, which work together to firm and lift the skin, reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, and improve overall skin texture and tone. The lightweight gel is infused with encapsulated oxygen, which helps to energize the skin and promote a healthy, radiant complexion.  I found this cream to be incredibly effective at hydrating my skin, leaving it feeling plump and smooth all day long. It absorbed quickly into my skin without leaving any greasy or sticky residue, and I loved how soft and supple my skin felt after using it.  Overall, I would highly recommend Dermalogica's Phyto Nature Oxygen Cream to anyone looking for a high-quality anti-aging moisturizer that delivers real results. The innovative packaging, luxurious texture, and powerful ingredients make this cream a standout product that truly delivers on its promises.
faceoff_positive.headline: Best cream I have ever used!

faceoff_negative.comments: Gifted by dermalogica. While I really enjoyed the texture of this and it's moisturized really well it most certainly did not give me back 4 years. My skin pre pandemic was something to really envy and I haven't been able to get back to that point just yet. I didn't notice my forehead lines being plumped which are my biggest concern. Again I really do enjoy this moisturizer but the price is a tough one to swallow for not living up to its claims
faceoff_negative.headline: Just get injections
